name: Zareen's
description: Zareen’s continues to offer fresh and frozen takeout meals during shelter-in-place. Additionally, in honor of Eid al-Fitr, owner Zareen Khan is offering sheer khurma (an Eid specialty dessert) and kulfi at her restaurants. Proceeds will go to Doctors Without Borders. -- Bay Area Bites

name: ZARU Tea
description: ZARU TEA Offers Free Delivery to Portland Metro Area | A Portion of All Sales Help Fund Projects Dedicated to Saving Endangered Species -- PDX Pipeline

name: Oui Chippy
description: Reopening with a new pop-up from the same team — Oui Chippy will specialize in casual, seafood-focused takeout inspired by fish and chips shops in the United Kingdom, plus wine and beer. -- Eater Portland

name: Nightingale New Happy Hours
description: New menu with take out, meal kits, and extended happy hour.

name: Fresh Roots Popup
description: Find us at our pickup and pop-up market stand from 4-7pm (details to follow about its exact location at the ICC), or go to the Main Office from 7-8pm for self-serve pickup!

name: Cocktail Classes
description: Check out Monday Night Mixology

name: Bell Tower Happy Hour
description: Happy hour specials on our patio from 3-6pm daily

name: Beer and Cider Release
description: PRIDE + JOY GRAF // Brewed as a hybrid between Cider & Beer, Graf is made by fermenting together a typical barley wort with cider-apple juice. We made Pride+Joy with apple juice from our good friends at Dominon Cider @dominioncider.

name: Happy 150th Anniversary
description: Golden Gate Park has opened its first-ever “pop-up” welcome center.  Decked out in GGP150 colors, the refurbished freight container features items from the official Golden Gate Park 150th Anniversary collection of merchandise such as locally designed zip hoodies, t-shirts, posters, pins, bison plushies, baseball caps, beanies, scarves, and mugs.  These specially-produced items are being sourced through SF Mercantile, a San Francisco-based retailer which produces high quality local interest gifts and keepsakes from area artists.

name: Car-free happy hour
description: Enjoy the patio and street life from 4-6pm. Street closed to traffic to give more space for safe dining.

name: Car-free happy hour
description: Enjoy the patio and street life from 4-6pm. Street closed to traffic to give more space for safe dining.

name: Manny's Livestream
description: Manny's hosts civic events, conversations, and more weekly.

name: Grand Re-Opening in Yaletown
description: Click link for reservation. With our new limited capacity reservations for our dining room are recommended. We welcome walk-in guests on our patio!.

name: Supper Club
description: Get invited to our Supper Club pre-sale, get Supper Club exclusive perks and join a community of like minded foodies who support the local art + music scene!.

name: New Tees, Pins, and Jerlery
description: Treat yourself to some new accessaies and visit Oaklandish's free curb-side pickup.

name: Support Local
description: Stop by the shop in Jack London Square and check out the new arrivals.

name: Get your gift box
description: Bay Made is open. Check out all our locally made gifts, art, and more

name: Order Ahead
description: *For curbside pick up in North Vancouver, Fridays & Tuesday, 3-6pm (Thursday 8pm & Monday 8pm deadline for order pickup next day). Contactless payments or e-transfers only. Call 604.839.9337 or email info@mrbannock.com.

name: ThoroughBread Order Ahead
description: Please be sure to select your preferred pick up date. Orders must be placed by noon on 2 days prior to the pickup date.

name: Slow Street Walk-Up Window
description: Stop by our walk-up window for an early morning cup or come inside for our full menu that includes cascara shrub, vanilla cold brew, and single origin nitro, all on tap. Share a pastry from Neighbor Bakehouse, b. patisserie, or Piccino; relax at our community table and catch up with friends; or spend a few minutes people-watching from our benches along Page Street.

name: Brunch at Dolores
description: Order a picnic in Dolore Park

name: Omakase Outdoords
description: Research a seat to a unique outdoor multi-course dining experience

name: Grand Re-opening & Take out
description: Maison Danel has reopenned for takeout and gifts.

name: Beer Garden & Brunch
description: Outdoor dining + drinking again! Come join us in our new cocktail + beer garden. Brunch also available Sat + Sun noon to 3:30. Hope to see you here soon!

name: Take out & New Releases
description: Chekc out the Federatino Brewing Shop for specials and to go item.

name: Vegan Pop Up Menu
description: During the month of August, we are hosting a special vegan pop up 10-7 Monday-Friday with our friends Quorn!

name: Garden Reservation
description: Starting July 2020, garden admissions, including complimentary admissions for garden members, are timed entries and available for purchase online in advance.
